Articles.Content:
I was looking at the site and saw some things aren't updated like this in the FAQ:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢AFTER LOGGING IN WITH THE UPDATER, IT IS UNABLE TO UPDATE THE GAME TO VERSION 0.15

The 0.15 update contains fixes to the updater itself, so it was made available as a full download from the store. You can download it from the KSP Store directly.

It's now 0.16 .
Maybe too busy with 0.17. They might update after 0.17 or when its released. =)
